rationale: A personal digital garden that prioritizes the joy of building over conventional blog structure. Ideas grow and interconnect through backlinks and semantic search. The process of creation is as important as the result.

problem.statement: Traditional blog platforms produce predictable, templated experiences with no connective tissue between ideas. The building process itself is uninspiring, and the chronological structure doesn't serve how thoughts actually develop and relate to each other.
impact: Ideas remain siloed and don't surface when relevant
The creative process of building is reduced to filling in templates
Readers (including the author) can't explore connections between thoughts

goals.primary: Build a personal digital garden that's as interesting to create as it is to explore, with interconnected ideas and non-linear navigation.
secondary: Learn new technologies through hands-on implementation
Create a space for quick observations, tangents, and curiosities
Implement bidirectional linking and semantic search
Document the AI-assisted development journey as content
Occasionally showcase photography from a 55-year personal archive

features.name: Digital Garden Structure
features.description: Non-chronological organization with ideas in growth states (seedling/growing/evergreen). Exploratory navigation rather than reverse-chronological feed.

features.name: Bidirectional Links
features.description: Wiki-style linking where mentioning concepts automatically surfaces connections to other posts. Backlinks shown on each post.

features.name: Semantic Search
features.description: Search that understands meaning and surfaces related content beyond keyword matching.

features.name: Draft/Seedling States
features.description: Private or unlisted states for ideas not yet ready for public viewing. Ability to mature content before publishing.

features.name: Image Hosting
features.description: Direct hosting of photography on the site with appropriate optimization. Photography as occasional element, not primary focus.

features.name: Brutalism-Lite Aesthetic
features.description: Bold, distinctive visual design with personality. Not aggressively inaccessible, but clearly not another generic template.

features.name: About Page
features.description: Low-key personal presence with contact method. Not a personal brand exercise.

features.name: Scrollytelling Capability
features.description: Scroll-triggered storytelling available for posts that warrant it. Not baked into core structure. Requires investigation to determine fit.

features.name: Automation Windows
features.description: RSS aggregation, activity feeds, currently reading/listening widgets pulling in external interests.

success_criteria.measurement: New technical skills acquired through implementation
The building process was genuinely fun and interesting
Bidirectional links and semantic search working as intended

use_cases.name: Publishing a Quick Observation
use_cases.scenario: Author has a thought sparked by something they read. It connects to a previous idea.
expected_behavior: Develop the thought, add links to related concepts
System automatically creates backlinks from referenced posts

use_cases.name: Exploring the Garden
use_cases.scenario: A visitor lands on a post about photography processing.
expected_behavior: See backlinks to other posts that reference similar concepts
Use semantic search to find related content

use_cases.name: Adding Photography
use_cases.scenario: Author wants to share an image from their archive with context.
expected_behavior: Link to related posts about technique or subject

edge_cases.problem: Half-formed ideas that aren't ready for public viewing
edge_cases.solution: Seedling state keeps posts private. Author controls when to promote to public.

edge_cases.problem: Posts with no backlinks or connections
edge_cases.solution: Surface orphan posts for review. Not everything needs connections, but awareness helps.
Automatic image optimization. Photography is occasional element, not high-volume.

assumptions: Claude Code will be primary implementor throughout the project
Tech stack must be learnable and debuggable with AI assistance
Technical complexity is welcomed as learning opportunity
Open-ended timeline allows for exploration and iteration
out_of_scope: Automation windows / RSS aggregation (deferred to post-v1)
User accounts or authentication for visitors

user_stated_preferences.disclaimer: These are user-stated starting points, NOT requirements. Downstream skills should provide unbiased recommendations.
